author: kfogel
msg: * INSTALL (Contents): Mention that svn compiles against both neon
0.19.2 and neon 0.19.3.  Update the URL to download neon to use
* build/buildcheck.sh: Rename NEON_WANTED to NEON_WANTED_REGEX to
reflect that a regular expression can be used.  New variables
NEON_LATEST_WORKING_VER and NEON_URL so that all Neon configuration
variables are set in one place instead of also set in
ac-helpers/neon.m4.  Use swith/case to determine if supplied Neon
* ac-helpers/neon.m4 (SVN_LIB_NEON): Instead of taking one argument
which is an exact string version of the required Neon, take three,
the first being a regular expression that matches
versions of Neon that can be used, the latest version of Neon that
can be used, and the URL for the latest Neon.  Now use Bourne
shell switch/case regular expression to see if the supplied Neon
can be used.  No longer set NEON_URL, have it passed in.
(SVN_NEON_CONFIG): Now use Bourne shell switch/case regular
expression to see if the supplied Neon can be used.
* configure.in: Call SVN_LIB_NEON() with three arguments, not one.

author: kfogel
msg: (Remainder of his patch applied in r1431.)

author: gstein
msg: Docco fixes for the new editor interface.
